Name: TacitRed Compromised Credentials
Author: TacitRed - support@tacitred.com
Description: The [TacitRed Compromised Credentials](https://www.tacitred.com/) solution integrates TacitRed's compromised credential and identity threat intelligence into Microsoft Sentinel using the Codeless Connector Framework (CCF). The solution deploys a REST API poller connector, a custom log table (TacitRed_Findings_CL), analytics rule, and visualization workbook to help security teams detect and investigate credential compromise.
